page.description: Show or hide a UX Control. Can also be used to show or hide a Tab or Accordion Pane.

argument.name: flag
argument.description: A true/false value defining if the control should be shown (*[js:true]*) or hidden (*[js:false]*).

argument.name: mode
argument.description: Optional. Default value is 'd'. Can be one of the following values:

item.name: v
item.description: Set the control visibility - preserves space taken by control when hidden.

argument.name: animationJSON
argument.description: Optional. Only available if mode = 'd'. A JSON object defining the animation transition. See the [A5.u.element.show Method] for more information on how to define an animation JSON object.
